message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to your endeavors. I'm initially offering it at $1,800,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can reach a fairer agreement. Considering the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $1,500,000.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm confident this product offers even greater value than you might currently estimate. I'm willing to come down to $1,700,000.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. Based on my needs and budget, I am willing to pay $1,600,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Let's meet in the middle, how about $1,650,000?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but considering my financial constraints, I am willing to pay $1,625,000 for the product.
